channel.title: Drunken Gamers Radio
channel.itunes:author: RobotPanic.com
channel.description: Join the Drunken Gamers from RobotPanic.com as they give reviews and previews of the latest games along with discussions of the latest industry news. It's your place to hear about the new and also learn about the old as the Drunken Gamers discuss retro games, shmups, pinball and arcade games along with the latest gen games and consoles! Join us at the bar!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Videogame coverage by the Drunken Gamers from RobotPanic.com
channel.itunes:summary: Videogame News, Reviews and Discussions live from the Team Fremont Bar with your hosts, the Drunken Gamers.
channel.itunes:keywords: videogames video games sony microsoft nintendo xbox gamecube psp ps2 wii 360
